arts.ttl: Pulisic drives Milan’s attack yet Juventus still a challenging barrier
arts.sum: Milan are preparing to face Juventus at the Allianz Stadium in Turin for Matchday 6 of the 2025/26 Serie A season. The Rossoneri, coached by Allegri, will take on Tudor’s side in a match expected to deliver plenty of drama. Both teams are in strong form, with Milan aiming to extend their winning streak. arts.ttl: MN: Curva Sud not present at Juventus-Milan due to protest – the reason
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher The Curva Sud will not be present to cheer on AC Milan at the Allianz Stadium on Sunday night as they are protesting about ticket prices. As MilanNews report, for yet another year, the Curva Sud Milano will not be traveling to Turin. arts.ttl: A 230-minute goal drought: All the key stats ahead of Juventus vs. Milan
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Juventus and AC Milan will add another instalment of their historic rivalry on Sunday night when they face off in Turin. This fixture has been played 289 times and Juventus hold an advantage, with 89 wins against Milan’s 66.
